definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: before tabernacle Ex 30:18, Ex 30:28, Ex 31:9, Ex 35:16, Ex 38:8, Ex 39:39, Ex 40:7, Ex 40:11, Ex 40:30, Le 8:11 (all P).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: 10 in number, 5 at each front corner of temple 1Ki 7:30, 1Ki 7:38, 1Ki 7:38, 1Ki 7:38, 1Ki 7:43 = 2Ch 4:14, 2Ch 4:6 (1Ki 7:40 rd. [[הַסִּירוֹת]] as v:1Ki 7:45 and ‖ 2Ch 4:11, 2Ch 4:16, so Heb. Codd. LXX Vulgate Th Ke Sta Klo al.)
